message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you coming down a bit. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $8500 at this time.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, and I appreciate your interest.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but $8500 is just too low for me.  How about $9000?  I think that's a fair compromise, considering the value the product has for you.
